actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the publication entitled "History of the Committee on the District of Columbia: The Planning, Development, Government and Institutions of the Nation's Capital (1808-1978)".

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the publication entitled "History of the Committee on the District of Columbia: The Planning, Development, Government, and Institutions of the Nation's Capital (1808-1978)" as a House document. Directs the printing of additional copies for the use of the Committee on the District of Columbia not to exceed a cost of $1,200.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the publication entitled "History of the Committee on the District of Columbia: The Planning, Development, Government and Institutions of the Nation's Capital (1808-1978)".
